Class DocumentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci331.team.red.server.DocumentHandler

  • public class DocumentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for generating documents, corrupting them as we go
    Author:
    ojourmel, melany

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initBossDocuments(Incident incident, Boss boss)
      Initializes the scripted documents needed for a given boss
      void initDocuments(Incident incident)
      Given an Incident, data for an incident.actor is corrupted if the fraud/clericalError flag has been set Corrupted data is saved to a document, which is stored in the Incident Three documents are created: DriversLisence, GoldenTicket(?), and Passport
      void initIntroDocuments(Incident incident)
      Initializes the scripted documents needed for the intro

      • initDocuments

        public void initDocuments(Incident incident)
        Given an Incident, data for an incident.actor is corrupted if the fraud/clericalError flag has been set Corrupted data is saved to a document, which is stored in the Incident Three documents are created: DriversLisence, GoldenTicket(?), and Passport
